tools.title: react-select
tools.description: React Select v2.0.0 is a complete rewrite, funded by Thinkmill and Atlassian. It represents a whole new approach to developing powerful React.js components that just work out of the box, while being extremely customisable.

tools.title: formik
tools.description: Build forms in React, without the tears.

tools.title: rematch
tools.description: Rematch is Redux best practices without the boilerplate. No more action types, action creators, switch statements or thunks.
